verbose_text: We assessed their cellular localization in ALT+ (U2OS and SW26) and TEL+ (HeLa LT and SW39) cells (XREF_FIG, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY) using antibodies against FANCJ and NLS-GFP-fusion proteins of RAD18 and Poleta, which were used to determine subcellular localization of both proteins in response to UV induced DNA damage and replicative stress.
evidence: TEL+ (HeLa LT and SW39) cells ( XREF_FIG , and  XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ) using antibodies against FANCJ               and NLS-GFP-fusion proteins of RAD18 and Poleta, which were used to determine subcellular localization of both proteins in response to UV-induced DNA damage
